title: This puzzle is not only a great Christmas gift…but it could be worth $1 million
content:
Macworld

Unless you’re independently wealthy, you probably aren’t giving out too many $1 million Christmas presents. However, there is a way to give a fun, engaging gift that could be worth $1 million to its recipient.

Of course, the thrill of a potentially huge payday is what makes The 2 Million Dollar Puzzle an ingenious idea that’s sure to be a big hit under any tree this holiday season.

Clearing some space on the dining room table is all you need to start working on this 500-piece puzzle. This image is a challenging puzzle that tests your analytical abilities, including black edges and accent colors all over it, so you’ll need to use shrewd puzzling skills to assemble it.

After solving that task, just take out a phone and scan the QR code in the image. Everybody wins something, even if it’s just $1. But two puzzles out there come with a grand prize of $1 million each. The excitement of completing the puzzle is victory enough, so the added prize is just icing on the cake.

Right now, you can pick up The 2 Million Dollar Puzzle for just $29.99. Or cross even more folks off your holiday shopping list by grabbing a pair of 2 Million Dollar Puzzles for only $49.99, or a 10-pack of puzzles for just $99.98, a price of less than $10 per puzzle. If you get your order in by Dec. 7, you’re guaranteed to have your items delivered by Christmas Day.
